treatments.name: Fungicides
treatments.description: Spray plants with a recommended fungicide to prevent the disease from spreading. Apply at the first sign of infection and repeat every 7-10 days.
treatments.recommended_dosage: As per the instructions on the label
treatments.precautions: Wear protective clothing, avoid spraying during windy conditions, and wash hands after use.

treatments.name: Crop Rotation
treatments.description: Rotate crops to reduce disease pressure. Avoid planting potatoes in the same area for at least two years.
treatments.precautions: Do not rotate with other solanaceous crops such as tomatoes, peppers, and eggplants.

treatments.name: Fungicides
treatments.description: Apply fungicides preventively before infection occurs. Fungicides should be applied in a spray program, typically at 7- to 14-day intervals.
treatments.recommended_dosage: As per the instructions on the label
treatments.precautions: Wear protective clothing, avoid spraying during windy conditions, and wash hands after use.

treatments.name: Cultural Control
treatments.description: Remove infected plants and debris from the field and destroy them. Do not compost the infected plants.
treatments.precautions: Dispose of infected plant material carefully and avoid spreading the disease to healthy plants.
